# XmlFormatterBase.PreserveWhitespace method

Whether this whitespace node should be preserved. Can be overridden

```csharp
protected virtual bool PreserveWhitespace(XText text)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| text | A whitespace text node |

## Return Value

true if it should be preserved as-is (default)
